name: Urban Climber
description:
Annoying re-imagining of the classic arcade title 'Crazy Climber'.

Climb to the top of the building to escape within the one minute time limit. Avoid the falling objects being dropped on you.

Note: I nearly forgot the jam theme of 'colourful' so I made the bird's eggs a variety of bright colours.

Made for One Minute Jam #5

Follow me on Twitter
